## SchemaRef interface

Reference to a schema to be used to validate principal or resource attributes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SchemaRef 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |

|  [ref](./core.schemaref.ref.md) |  | string | ID of the schema. |
